original_text: He serves as priest in heaven on our behalf. He is in God's very special place, near to God himself. That is like the special place in the tabernacle of long ago. But it is not a tent that people have made. The Lord himself has made this special place, and it is the true one.
korean_text: 성소와 참 장막에서 섬기는 이시라 이 장막은 주께서 세우신 것이요 사람이 세운 것이 아니니라

sentences.original_text: He serves as priest in heaven on our behalf.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하늘에서 우리를 대신하여 제사장으로 봉사합니다.

sentences.original_text: He is in God's very special place,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님의 아주 특별한 곳에 있으며,

sentences.original_text: That is like the special place
in the tabernacle of long ago.
sentences.korean_translation: 오래전 성막 안에 있던 것과 같습니다.

sentences.original_text: But it is not a tent that people have made.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그것은 사람들이 만든 장막이 아닙니다.

sentences.original_text: The Lord himself has made this special place,
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 친히 이 특별한 곳을 만드셨고,

sentences.original_text: and it is the true one.
